label: DocumentStatus
comment: The information relevant to a condition related to a document.

datatypeProperties.comment: A condition or status, expressed as text, for this process characteristic.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the condition of this document status.
A code specifying a reason for this document status.
A note included for this document status.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
The invalid information, expressed as text, for this document status.
A process condition, expressed as text, for this acknowledgement document.
The code specifying the process condition for this acknowledgement document.
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.
A reason classification, expressed as text, for this document status.
The code specifying the reason classification for this document status.
Information, expressed as text, related to the reason for this cancellation status.
The code specifying the reason for the information for this document status.
The reference date or date time for this referenced document.
A requested action, expressed as text, for this document status.
A code specifying a requested action for this basic work item.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
A document characteristic specified for this document status.
The valid information, expressed as text, for this document status.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.

referencedBy.comment: The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
Status information specified for this referenced document.
